categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic awards

nodes.text: The Bronze Nova for Conspicuous Gallantry was an award handed out by the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. Rebel pilot Shara Bey earned this award for her actions during the Liberation of Gorma. In 5 ABY, Alphabet Squadron pilot Nath Tensent of the New Republic was awarded it after he and his droid T5 dove their BTL Y-wing starfighter into a missile launched by Shadow Wing. He wore it to a party a few days after the Troithe operation wrapped up.
The Bronze Nova was first mentioned in the 2015 novel Before the Awakening'.
